夝字的基本解释

夝
qíng
古同“晴”，天空中没有云或云很少。

夝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qíng］
［《廣韻》疾盈切，平清，從。］
亦作“甠1”。“晴1”的古字。

夝字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【夕字部】　夝； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页247第01
【說文】同晴。雨而夜除星見也。【徐鉉曰】今俗作晴，非。【總要】作①。从夕星，會意。【正字通】按晴者，霽之通稱，晝夜皆然。諸家泥从夕从星，專訓夜霽，非。或作暒。【前漢·天文志】天暒而景星見。　又【集韻】甾莖切，音爭。義同。①字从夕星。

夝字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
夝字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
夝
qíng
Gutong is "sunny", there are no clouds or few clouds in the sky.
夝
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qíng］
["Guangyun" surging sharply, calm and clear, from. ]
Also known as "甠1". The ancient character of "Qing 1".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Xi Zi Department] 　夝; Kangxi strokes: 8; Page number: page 247 01
[Said the text] Tongqing. See you in addition to the stars in the rain and night. [Xu Xuan said] Today's custom is clear, not. [Always] Do ①. From the evening star, knowing. 【Zhengzitong】According to the sunny person, the general name of Ji, both day and night. Zhujia Ni from the evening from the stars, specializing in training Ye Ji, non. Or do it. [Previous Han·Astronomy] See you in the sky and the stars.　[Jiyun] The steroid stem is cut, and the sound is contended. The same meaning. ① The word is from Xixing.
